spiritsExplanation:
The workout 'High Energy HIIT Row' embodies a strong 'High-Energy & Intense' spirit, evident from the title and description emphasizing high-intensity intervals and an intensity level of 3 out of 3. The music choices, featuring energetic pop and global hits, further support a fast-paced and vigorous session. The rowing format with 'low splits' indicates a focus on maximizing performance and effort, thus aligning well with the intense energy spirit, warranting a score of 0.9.

Additionally, the workout takes place along the Charles River, indicating an 'Outdoor & Adventure' spirit. This natural setting adds an exploratory and environmental element, enhancing the adventure aspect. The presence of instructors rowing in a river setting contributes to the outdoor experience, justifying a score of 0.8 for this spirit. The combination of intensity and outdoor environment is clear from the metadata, leading to high confidence in this classification.
